entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:33 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -3.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
